episode_event_winter_2025/4001_1001_0200:
I’m really happy Juliana and the others
invited me to a winter party, but what
should I cook?
episode_event_winter_2025/4001_1001_0300:
What do you guys think, Mabosstiff?
Scovillain?
episode_event_winter_2025/4001_1001_0400:
Maybe I shouldn’t have raised the bar so
high, saying I was gonna make something
super special.
episode_event_winter_2025/4001_1001_0500: I’ve never been to a party like this before...
episode_event_winter_2025/4001_1001_0700: What were you talking about just now?
episode_event_winter_2025/6801_1001_0100:
It’s who you eat with and what you eat that
flavor your memory of a meal.
episode_event_winter_2025/6801_1001_0200:
As a cook, I’m gonna make sure everyone’s
experience is nothing but the finest!
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0100:
I see. So you’re not sure what to make for
the winter party.
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0200: This might be a good opportunity...
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0300:
Well don’t just keep it to yourself. What do
you mean?
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0400:
The thing is, I’m planning a winter party for
my family, too.
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0600:
I was gonna have Siebold teach me how to
cook a few dishes.
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0700:
What?! THE Siebold? The legendary chef
from Kalos?!
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_0900: Would I ever! Count me in!
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_1000: By the way, what was your name?
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_1100:
Oh, right. I never introduced myself.
The name’s Gladion.
episode_event_winter_2025/4002_1001_1200: I’m Arven! Nice to meet you, Gladion!
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_0100:
Before we start cooking, I’d like to hear
what kind of dishes you’d all like to make.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_0200:
I want to make something for my dear
mother!
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_0300:
With our dish, we wanna thank her for
working hard for our family.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_0700:
I want to make a special dish—something
different from what I’d usually make!
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_0800: What did you have in mind?
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_0900: I... I guess I still don’t know.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_1200:
I don’t think I’ve ever seen that Pokémon
back in Alola!
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_1400:
In Paldea, components extracted from
Scovillain are used in chili sauce. So it’s a
Pokémon with a deep connection to cooking!
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_1500:
Do you think maybe it came out to help
you cook?
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_1600: That’d be my best guess, too.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_1800:
Why don’t you cook together with Scovillain
and try making something for those special
to you?
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_2000:
Cooking with someone in mind does improve
the artistry of the dish.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_2100:
It’s important to keep in mind who you’re
cooking for, not just what dish to make.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_2300:
I guess you’re right. It doesn’t have to be
a family member.
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_2400:
I should put my heart into making something
for my pals and my Pokémon!
episode_event_winter_2025/4003_1001_2500:
It seems you’ve landed on a direction for
your dish.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1101_0100: On the day of the winter party...
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_0200:
All right. I’ve got everyone’s presents
sorted out...
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_0300:
and I’m done buying ingredients for my dish!
We’re all set!
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_0400:
Oh, it’s Gladion and Lillie. I wonder if they’re
grocery shopping, too.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_0500:
I’m so sorry... I’ll get there as soon as
possible.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_0600: It’s OK, Mom. It isn’t your fault.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_0800: Hey, about that call just now...
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1000:
Mom said she can’t make it to the party
tonight.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1200:
It’s because of work, so this is no time to
be selfish.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1400:
Your mom’s president of the
Aether Foundation, right?
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1500: She is, yes. Why do you ask?
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1600: You two keep preparing for the party!
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1700:
Trusty Arven will figure out a way to get
your mom to attend!
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1800:
Hang on, Arven. What exactly are you
planning?
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_1900:
Don’t you also have a party with your
friends?
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_2000:
Don’t worry about us. This happens all
the time...
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_2100: Then I REALLY can’t let this slide!
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_2200: I know you both treasure your mom.
episode_event_winter_2025/4004_1001_2300:
Today’s special! That’s why you’ve gotta
spend it with her!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_0100:
Madam President! Please leave the rest
to us!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_0700:
Hey, you! What’re you doing, prioritizing
work over family?!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_0800:
Didn’t you promise Gladion and Lillie you’d
spend time together?!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_0900:
Hey! Hang on a second! This is hard on the
president, too!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1000:
Look, a Trainer out there lost their
Pokémon...
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1100:
and the president is doing everything in her
power to reunite them, because to that
Trainer, that Pokémon is family!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1300: She even told us to go home already.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1400:
You all have important people waiting for
you too, after all.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1600:
I’m both a mother and the president of
the Aether Foundation.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1700: ...I see. Sorry for shouting at you.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_1900:
If that’s the case, then let me help you find
that missing Pokémon!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_2100: Because I promised Gladion and Lillie!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_2300:
Your family reminds me of what mine
was like.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_2500:
My parents were always busy. I barely have
any memories of them playing with me.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_2700:
But I recently learned they really did care
about me!
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_2800:
Gladion and Lillie also know about the work
you’re doing—and that you do it out of love
for them.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_3000:
I just wanna make sure you get to spend this
special day together.
episode_event_winter_2025/4005_1001_3200:
Then I will happily accept your help.
Would you mind?
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_0100: She said they haven’t searched this area yet.
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_0400: Of course! ’Cause our pal called us!
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_0500: I guess you still haven’t found it, huh?
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_0600:
Yeah. That Pokémon’s gotta be hungry
by now.
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_0800:
Maybe we can lure it out with the smell of
your cooking!
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_0900:
Oh yeah... Come to think of it, our present
for Arven would be perfect for that!
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_1100:
Yup. It’s still a little early to open
presents, but...
episode_event_winter_2025/4006_1001_1200: Here you go, Arven! This is from all of us!
episode_event_winter_2025/4007_1001_0200:
Hehehe! Thanks a bunch! This is the best
present ever!
episode_event_winter_2025/4007_1001_0500: Let’s top it off with a dash of chili sauce...
episode_event_winter_2025/4007_1001_0600:
And we’ll use Scovillain’s flames to up
the heat...
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_0100: I’m so glad the whole family’s together!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_0200:
Yeah. It wouldn’t have been possible
without you.
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_0400: No prob, buddy! That’s what friends are for!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_0600:
While you’re here, wanna try some of our
cooking?
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_0800:
I’ve got company today, so you should enjoy
it as a family!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_1000:
You’re our friend, so come hang out with
us again sometime, OK? You’re always
welcome.
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_1200:
I heard what happened. Sounds like you
were a huge help.
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_1400:
Were you able to complete your
special dish?
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_1600:
To make the dish to lure out that missing
Pokémon, I had to use all the ingredients
I got for the party...
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_1700:
So I wasn’t able to make what I initially had
in mind.
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_1800: But you put your all into it, right?
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2000: Then I’m sure it’ll taste just fine.
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2100:
I’m sure the love you put into it will touch
the hearts of those special to you.
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2300:
I’ll put my heart and soul into my cooking
and make everyone smile!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2400: Sorry to keep you waiting, guys!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2600:
I’m so hungry, I was about to order
something myself...
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2700:
Ahaha, Penny’s just giving you grief for
being late! She was looking forward to your
cooking!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2800: H-hey! You didn’t have to say that!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_2900:
You SHOULD be looking forward to it!
I made something pretty darn good!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_3000: Also...I’ve got some presents for you all!
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_3100:
I was the only one who got to open mine
early, since you all gave me that apron
earlier...
episode_event_winter_2025/4008_1001_3400: You’ll just have to open it to find out!
